name: DENTAL_CLINATTLVL_HX
description: This table contains the past clinical attachment level values recorded for a tooth.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical instant in the tooth record. Together with FINDING_ID, this forms the foreign key to the DENTAL_TOOTH_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple clinical attachment level readings associated with the tooth and the historical instant from the DENTAL_TOOTH_HX table

columns.name: DENT_CLIN_ATT_HX
columns.description: This column tracks the history of clinical attachment level readings (in millimeters) on a particular tooth.
